[docs]    def __init__(self, host):
        super(WedgeBios, self).__init__(host)



[docs]    def _get_bios_update_cmd(self, get_path, binary_name, toolname):
        """TODO: when wedge100s test was developed. The update tool need
         additional dependency drivers fro kernal 4.0. Now since latest
         kernel is 4.6.x we need to revisite this"""
        raise TestError("Wedge100s Bios update need new dependency files")
        return ("./%s %s /P /B /N /K /X" % (toolname, binary_name))



[docs]    def cycle_post_bios_upgrade(self):
        self.host.oob.power_reset()
